r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: * PCBC-515: allow to specify expiration for subdocument mutations * PCBC-509: implement fulldoc operations for subdoc API * PCBC-442: fail fast view requests on ephemeral buckets * PCBC-513: make public API non-final (remove final attribute from classes and methods)
